product_name: Wilderness Press Another Fork in the Trail: Vegetarian and Vegan Recipes for the Backcountry
long_description: . Author: Laurie Ann March. Softcover; 302 pages; color pictures. Wilderness Press; copyright 2011. Detailed descriptions and instructions for 160 vegetarian and vegan recipes that are ideal for extended backpacking or camping trips. Recipes include breakfasts, lunches, dinners, desserts, snacks, drinks and a special section on more elaborate dishes. Introductory section explains principles of packing and cooking food while backpacking, including dehydration procedures, menu planning and ingredient substitutions. Extensive glossary introduces less-popular ingredients and explains how to best use them.
short_description: Another Fork in the Trail brings vegan and vegetarian cooking to the trail with delicious recipes that are easy to prep at home and easy to cook while camping.
